comment: Procedural compliance verified. CR-007 accurately identifies a genuine conflict: SOP-002 Section 5 states IDs 'are never reused' (line 82), while SOP-001 Section 9.7.1 states canceled document IDs 'are freed for reuse' (line 478). The proposed clarification - distinguishing between completed documents (no reuse) and canceled never-effective documents (reuse permitted) - is logically sound and resolves the conflict. Scope is appropriately limited. No TU reviewers required - this is a straightforward SOP text clarification.

Post-review verification complete. EI table shows all 3 items COMPLETE with evidence. SOP-002 v2.1 verified: (1) revision_summary correctly references CR-007, (2) Section 5 updated with ID Reuse Policy clarification distinguishing completed documents (never reused) from canceled documents (freed for reuse per SOP-001 Section 9.7.1). Conflict between SOP-001 and SOP-002 resolved.
